memberdef.name: scalarToNDAttrDataType
memberdef.initializer: = { NDAttrInt8, NDAttrInt8, NDAttrInt16, NDAttrInt32, NDAttrInt64, NDAttrUInt8, NDAttrUInt16, NDAttrUInt32, NDAttrUInt64, NDAttrFloat32, NDAttrFloat64, NDAttrString, }

memberdef.name: NDDataTypeToScalar
memberdef.initializer: = { pvByte, pvUByte, pvShort, pvUShort, pvInt, pvUInt, pvLong, pvULong, pvFloat, pvDouble, }
